columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the application.

columns.name: create_time
columns.description: The time at which the deployment configuration was created.

columns.name: compute_platform
columns.description: The destination platform type for the deployment (Lambda, Server, or ECS).

columns.name: minimum_healthy_hosts
columns.description: Information about the number or percentage of minimum healthy instances.

columns.name: traffic_routing_config
columns.description: The configuration that specifies how the deployment traffic is routed. Used for deployments with a Lambda or Amazon ECS compute platform only.
